mapper.select: select id channelId,name channelName,name sendMethod,case status when 0 then 2 else 1 end deployType , 1 resultType from channel
select c.id channelId,1 result from warn_edit_content w left join channel c on w.channel_id=c.id where w.warn_edit_id =#{taskId}

select distinct w.id taskId,d.icon img,c.content sendContent from warn_edit as w left join disaster as d on w.disaster_id=d.id left join warn_edit_content c on w.id =c.warn_edit_id order by w.send_time desc LIMIT 1
